about_the_game:
Witness the end of humanity and embark on a journey to rebuild civilization in Mariposa—a game developed with a singular purpose, to provide a balance to fast and easy rewards. The ultimate number management game for skilled strategists!

Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Mariposa, where precise planning and strategic thinking reign supreme. This game is tailored for those who appreciate the art of managing intricate numbers and excel at complex decision-making.
As a master of the numbers game, you hold the power to build and nurture a thriving civilization. Manage resources and unlock the full potential of your facilities. In Mariposa, every detail matters, and it's about harnessing the true power of numbers.

Embark on a journey of strategic brilliance with Mariposa's turn-based gameplay. Each move requires meticulous calculation and thoughtful consideration. Make decisions with foresight and shape a civilization as you navigate the intricacies of the game. Mariposa celebrates the prowess of strategic minds and offers a rewarding experience for those who appreciate the challenges of efficient management.
Indulge in the deep gameplay experience that appeals to strategists and connoisseurs of turn based colony simulations alike. Mariposa invites you to delve into a world of complex number systems and profound management. It's a game that tests your skills and rewards your strategic choices.
Immerse yourself in the visually enchanting world of Mariposa, crafted to ignite your imagination. Experience a captivating aesthetic that combines minimalism with depth, creating a visually stunning experience that will captivate your senses.

Get Mariposa now and embark on a journey to become the ultimate master of the numbers game!


Short FAQ:

How big is the development team?
    Just 2 Individuals.
How long is the game in development?
    4+ Years and that's just the beginning.
How much budget was fund raised?
    We don't think there was any.
Can I win this game?
    Sure.
